title: Bezos Vs. Musk: Billionaire Battle Goes From Space To AI With New Company
description: A rivalry between Jeff Bezos and Elon Musk has centered on the space sector. That rivalry now heads to artificial intelligence with a new company launched by Bezos.
content:
Two of the world's wealthiest people could be gearing up for a new battle, with Amazon.com and Blue Origin founder Jeff Bezos taking on the artificial intelligence sector and billionaire Elon Musk.
From Space to AI

title: Amazon seeks $18b from first US bond sale in three years
description: Amazon is selling investment-grade bonds in as many as six parts, amid an industry-wide race to build artificial intelligence infrastructure.
content:
Amazon is seeking to raise about $US12 billion ($18.4 billion) through a debt offering — its first such deal in US dollars in about three years — amid an industry-wide race to build artificial intelligence infrastructure.

title: Google parent Alphabet shares jump 5% after Berkshire Hathaway makes rare tech bet with $4.9 billion stake
description: Berkshire Hathaway's significant investment in Alphabet, valued at $4.93 billion, signals a strong endorsement of the tech giant's artificial intelligence capabilities. This rare tech bet by the conglomerate, under Warren Buffett's leadership, comes as Alphabet emerges as the top-performing "Magnificent Seven" stock this year, driven by AI advancements and a robust ad business.

title: Celero raises $140 million from Alphabet's CapitalG fund, others for AI networking chip
description: Celero Communications, a U.S. startup founded by networking industry veterans, on Monday said it has raised $140 million to build a chip that will help link artificial intelligence data centers across vast distances.
content: SAN FRANCISCO, Nov 17 (Reuters) - Celero Communications, a U.S. startup founded by networking industry veterans, on Monday said it has raised $140 million to build a chip that will help link artificial intelligence data centers across vast distances.... [1479 chars]
